    • Method Detail

      • sensitivity

        public Position sensitivity(Position input,
                            double sensitivity)
        Changes the sensitivity of the joystick values. Call after applying other adjustments to the joystick values.
        Parameters:
        input - The values of the joystick.
        sensitivity - The sensitivity (greater than 0, where 0 is no movement)
        Returns:
        The adjusted controller input with the sensitivity applied.

      • sensitivity

        public double sensitivity(double input,
                          double sensitivity)
        Changes the sensitivity of the joystick value. Call after applying other adjustments to the joystick value.
        Parameters:
        input - The value of the joystick.
        sensitivity - The sensitivity (greater than 0, where 0 is no movement)
        Returns:
        The adjusted controller input with the sensitivity applied.

      • power

        public Position power(Position input,
                      double pow)
        Smoothes the value of the joystick by a power. Should be applied after a deadzone transformation.
        Parameters:
        input - The value of the joystick.
        pow - The smoothing power.
        Returns:
        The smoothed joystick value.

      • power

        public double power(double input,
                    double pow)
        Smoothes the value of the joystick by a power. Should be applied after a deadzone transformation.
        Parameters:
        input - The value of the joystick.
        pow - The smoothing power.
        Returns:
        The smoothed joystick value.

      • scaledRadialDeadzone

        public Position scaledRadialDeadzone(Position input,
                                     double thresh)
        Blocks movement with a radius of (0, 0) and scales the resulting good zones from 0 to +/- 1
        Parameters:
        input - The value of the joystick.
        thresh - The deadzone threshold.
        Returns:
        The adjusted joystick value with the deadzone.
